introduction: SYNOPSISDa-hi lives with her alcoholic father, mother who runs a small restaurant, a sister who goes to an evening school and a paralyzed brother. Da-hi runs away from home dreaming of a luxurious life. She lives with a poor musician Young-hun but soon moves on to Kyung-min who has a luxurious apartment. But Kyung-min cannot satisfy her and faces death. She realizes she carries his child having nowhere to go.故事猪蹄母亲和父亲醉酒和Denise参加夜校和姐姐和弟弟住在一起小儿麻痹症苏民的房子是远离家乡与多彩的世界的钦佩和羡慕。她离家出走后，一个贫穷的音乐是真正的爱情一样迷人又俏皮的生活，但去younghun和sokkop由另一名男子（庆民）豪华公寓所取代。然而，Kyungmin和她的救赎一样被摧毁。在他死前，她发现她有一个庆阳的孩子。我也意识到，我正在回去的路上，我不能再走了。
